text: @AmbJohnBolton The Coronavirus was created in a lab in Oregon.Trump had it spread to China by a military cyclist to destabilize their economy. Trump is responsible for this pandemic and the deaths it has caused. #TrumpVirus #TrumpVirusCoverup
